017package org.apache.juneau.rest.client.remote;
018
019import static org.apache.juneau.commons.utils.CollectionUtils.*;
020import static org.apache.juneau.http.remote.RemoteUtils.*;
021
022import java.lang.reflect.*;
023import java.util.concurrent.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.http.annotation.*;
026import org.apache.juneau.http.remote.*;
027import org.apache.juneau.httppart.bean.*;
028import org.apache.juneau.commons.lang.*;
029import org.apache.juneau.commons.reflect.*;
030
031/**
032 * Represents the metadata about the returned object of a method on a remote proxy interface.
033 *
034 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
035 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/RestProxyBasics">REST Proxy Basics</a>
036 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauRestClientBasics">juneau-rest-client Basics</a>
037 * </ul>
038 */
039public class RemoteOperationReturn {
040
041   private static final AnnotationProvider AP = AnnotationProvider.INSTANCE;
042
043   private final Type returnType;
044   private final RemoteReturn returnValue;
045   private final ResponseBeanMeta meta;
046   private boolean isFuture, isCompletableFuture;
047
048   RemoteOperationReturn(MethodInfo m) {
049      var rt = m.getReturnType();
050
051      var ap = AP;
052      var al = rstream(ap.find(m)).filter(REMOTE_OP_GROUP).toList();
053
054      var rv = (RemoteReturn)null;
055
056      if (rt.is(Future.class)) {
057         isFuture = true;
058         rt = ClassInfo.of(((ParameterizedType)rt.innerType()).getActualTypeArguments()[0]);
059      } else if (rt.is(CompletableFuture.class)) {
060         isCompletableFuture = true;
061         rt = ClassInfo.of(((ParameterizedType)rt.innerType()).getActualTypeArguments()[0]);
062      }
063
064      if (rt.is(void.class) || rt.is(Void.class)) {
065         rv = RemoteReturn.NONE;
066      } else {
067         Value<RemoteReturn> v = Value.of(RemoteReturn.BODY);
068         al.forEach(ai -> ai.getValue(RemoteReturn.class, "returns").ifPresent(x -> v.set(x)));
069         rv = v.get();
070      }
071
072      if (rt.hasAnnotation(Response.class) && rt.isInterface()) {
073         this.meta = ResponseBeanMeta.create(m, AnnotationWorkList.create());
074         rv = RemoteReturn.BEAN;
075      } else {
076         this.meta = null;
077      }
078
079      this.returnType = rt.innerType();
080      this.returnValue = rv;
081   }
082
083   /**
084    * Returns schema information about the HTTP part.
085    *
086    * @return Schema information about the HTTP part, or <jk>null</jk> if not found.
087    */
088   public ResponseBeanMeta getResponseBeanMeta() { return meta; }
089
090   /**
091    * Returns the class type of the method return.
092    *
093    * @return The class type of the method return.
094    */
095   public Type getReturnType() { return returnType; }
096
097   /**
098    * Specifies whether the return value is the body of the request or the HTTP status.
099    *
100    * @return The type of value returned.
101    */
102   public RemoteReturn getReturnValue() { return returnValue; }
103
104   /**
105    * Returns <jk>true</jk> if the return is wrapped in a {@link CompletableFuture}.
106    *
107    * @return <jk>true</jk> if the return is wrapped in a {@link CompletableFuture}.
108    */
109   public boolean isCompletableFuture() { return isCompletableFuture; }
110
111   /**
112    * Returns <jk>true</jk> if the return is wrapped in a {@link Future}.
113    *
114    * @return <jk>true</jk> if the return is wrapped in a {@link Future}.
115    */
116   public boolean isFuture() { return isFuture; }
117}
